page.description: Formats string values to make them uppercase.

section.description: The directive is can be placed inside a placeholder for the string to be defined.
For example, say you had this set of JSON data and wanted to change the 'firstname' field to uppercase.
In the Template an uppercase directive can be added inside the firstname placeholder.

section.example: Employee name:FRED Smith Employee name:LAURA Linneker Employee name:JUNIOR Programmer Employee name:BILL Lindsey
section.note: The missing data directive can be combined with formatting directives. For example: {price:number('#.00')||N/A}
